message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[19-Apr-2025 23:47:37 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_xloc_locations ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, post_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, latitude float(10,6) NOT NULL, longitude float(10,6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
